ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) package double crust ready-to-use pie crust
3 (15 ounce) cans pitted sour cherries, drained

cookingTips: Tapioca thickens the filling while keeping it clear and glossy
Let the filling rest 15 minutes before adding top crust to allow tapioca to activate
Brush egg wash on crust for a golden, shiny finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through creating a classic tart cherry pie with proper thickening and a beautiful golden crust.
